IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Provide facilities for public use Facilities include Arena Exhibition Hall Historic Theater Retail Space and Parking Lots
IRS990.MissionDesc: PROVIDE FACILITIES FOR PUBLIC USE. FACILITIES INCLUDE: SPORTS ARENA, EXHIBITION AND DISPLAY HALL, HISTORIC THEATER, RETAIL SPACE, PARKING LOTS AND PUBLIC PARK. PATRONS SERVED APPROXIMATELY 1,100,000.
IRS990.Desc: Provide facilities for public use. Facilities include: sports arena, exhibition and display hall, historic theater, retail space, parking lots and public park. Patrons served approximately 1,150,000.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: Building & equip. rental, Concessions & display ad.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Funds are held purely in a custodial capacity and
include proceeds received from ticket and event sales
and later remitted to the promoter of the event.
LCC does not believe there are any material uncertain
tax positions, and accordingly, has not recognized any
liability for unrecognized tax benefits or possible
related interest or penalties.
Purpose of Series 2008A Bond was to refund Series 2001A
Bond that had an original purpose for expansion
and renovation of facilities.
Deidre Lyons is a Director of Lexington Center
Corporation and a Principal of closely-held Alltech, Inc.
Alltech leased conference space and related services from
Lexington Center during several days in the fiscal year
Form 990 prepared by the CFO and reviewed by the President and CEO.
Conflict of Interest Policy reviewed annually. Management and Directors are
required annually to confirm compliance and/or document potential conflicts
President & CEO position reviewed by Board Committee. Last reviewed in 2016
President reviews other management. Last reviewed using 3rd party in 2018.
Governing documents, corporate policies and financial information are
available for review through open-record requests to the corporation.
